publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3519.1 Robin Harper: Call for Withdrawal of Motion to Remove Haddock From Sale—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3519) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end “but notes that the stock size still relies on one year class, 1999, and that evidence of a new healthy year class is not yet fully established, so caution should still be exercised over the exploitation of the present stock of haddock.”

S2M-3519.1 Robin Harper: Call for Withdrawal of Motion to Remove Haddock From Sale—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3519) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "but notes that the stock size still relies on one year class, 1999, and that evidence of a new healthy year class is not yet fully established, so caution should still be exercised over the exploitation of the present stock of haddock."
